biz.onomato.frskydash

Class BluetoothSerialService.ConnectedThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • biz.onomato.frskydash.BluetoothSerialService.ConnectedThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    BluetoothSerialService

    private class BluetoothSerialService.ConnectedThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This thread runs during a connection with a remote device. It handles all incoming and outgoing transmissions.
